Quest.Name: Precious and Fragile Things Need Special Handling

CustomBehavior.Text:
There is a problem moving char to quest

 Please move your char to: AZUREMYST ISLE
 and start bot.

CustomBehavior.Macro: /run for i=0,4 do for j=1,GetContainerNumSlots(i)do l=GetContainerItemLink(i,j)if l then _,_,q=GetItemInfo(l)if q==0 or q==2 or q==3 then PickupContainerItem(i,j)PickupMerchantItem(0)end end end end
/run for i=0,4 do for j=1,GetContainerNumSlots(i)do l=GetContainerItemLink(i,j)if l then _,_,q=GetItemInfo(l)if q==0 or q==2 or q==3 then PickupContainerItem(i,j)PickupMerchantItem(0)end end end end

PickUp.QuestName: On the Wings of a Hippogryph

TurnIn.QuestName: On the Wings of a Hippogryph
Precious and Fragile Things Need Special Handling

While.Condition: StyxWoW.Me.Specialization != WoWSpec.HunterBeastMastery && StyxWoW.Me.Specialization != WoWSpec.HunterMarksmanship && StyxWoW.Me.Specialization != WoWSpec.HunterSurvival
StyxWoW.Me.Specialization != WoWSpec.PriestDiscipline && StyxWoW.Me.Specialization != WoWSpec.PriestHoly && StyxWoW.Me.Specialization != WoWSpec.PriestShadow
StyxWoW.Me.Specialization != WoWSpec.MageArcane && StyxWoW.Me.Specialization != WoWSpec.MageFire && StyxWoW.Me.Specialization != WoWSpec.MageFrost
StyxWoW.Me.Specialization != WoWSpec.WarriorArms && StyxWoW.Me.Specialization != WoWSpec.WarriorFury && StyxWoW.Me.Specialization != WoWSpec.WarriorProtection

StyxWoW.Me.Specialization != WoWSpec.DruidBalance && StyxWoW.Me.Specialization != WoWSpec.DruidFeral && StyxWoW.Me.Specialization != WoWSpec.DruidGuardian && StyxWoW.Me.Specialization != WoWSpec.DruidRestoration
StyxWoW.Me.Specialization != WoWSpec.ShamanElemental && StyxWoW.Me.Specialization != WoWSpec.ShamanEnhancement && StyxWoW.Me.Specialization != WoWSpec.ShamanRestoration
StyxWoW.Me.Specialization != WoWSpec.MonkBrewmaster && StyxWoW.Me.Specialization != WoWSpec.MonkMistweaver && StyxWoW.Me.Specialization != WoWSpec.MonkWindwalker
StyxWoW.Me.Specialization != WoWSpec.WarlockAffliction && StyxWoW.Me.Specialization != WoWSpec.WarlockDemonology && StyxWoW.Me.Specialization != WoWSpec.WarlockDestruction
StyxWoW.Me.Specialization != WoWSpec.RogueAssassination && StyxWoW.Me.Specialization != WoWSpec.RogueCombat && StyxWoW.Me.Specialization != WoWSpec.RogueSubtlety
StyxWoW.Me.Specialization != WoWSpec.PaladinHoly && StyxWoW.Me.Specialization != WoWSpec.PaladinProtection && StyxWoW.Me.Specialization != WoWSpec.PaladinRetribution

CustomBehavior.Macro: /run for i=0,4 do for j=1,GetContainerNumSlots(i)do l=GetContainerItemLink(i,j)if l then _,_,q=GetItemInfo(l)if q==0 or q==2 or q==3 then PickupContainerItem(i,j)PickupMerchantItem(0)end end end end
/run for bag = 0,4,1 do for slot = 1, 32, 1 do local name = GetContainerItemLink(bag,slot); PickupContainerItem(bag,slot); DeleteCursorItem(); end; end
